mapper.select: select id, role_name, role_code, sort, status, update_time, create_time, del_flag from sys_role where id = #{id}
select id, role_name, role_code, sort, status, update_time, create_time, del_flag from sys_role limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_role(role_name, role_code, sort, status, update_time, create_time, del_flag) values (#{roleName}, #{roleCode}, #{sort}, #{status}, #{updateTime}, #{createTime}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update sys_role
role_name = #{roleName},
role_code = #{roleCode},
sort = #{sort},
status = #{status},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select role_code from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id left join sys_user u on u.id = ur.user_id where u.username = #{username};
